page.title: 12INTERVIEWS WITH GOLFERS.
page.content: We interviewed several golfers about their use of the{Berkshire Golf Club.} All the golfers interviewd were quite elderly and enjoyed the recreational value of the sport. They liked the friendly atmosphere of the club and all thought that the{facilities}were excellent. These include a restaurant, two bars, changing rooms with showers and a rest room with billiards and card tables. Some golfers had been members for up to thirty years, some travelled over twenty miles to play and all those interviewed used the Golf Club more than once a week. From Mondays to Fridays societies come for a day and go round both courses. At the weekends it is members only. There is a ten year waiting list and only ten people are admitted each year.
